British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
The BSKL Chinese department is planning on taking a residential trip to Taiwan from 15th June to 14th July 2013.
Students will attend daily Mandarin courses at the National Taiwan Normal University. After the course, students will have the oppurtunities to visit some wonderful places in Taiwan.
The trip is open to 20 students only.
If you would like to get further information regarding the trip, please attend a talk being held by the Chinese department on Friday 18th January 2013 at 2pm in the ICT.
Regards, The Chinese Department The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
